title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Blended Science Instructional Design for Pre-Service Adult Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete one blended learning design document reflecting adult learners’ cognitive and social characteristics.
Learners can implement ≥3 interaction strategies by linking mobile-optimized online activities with face-to-face sessions.
Learners can collaboratively develop science curriculum-based project evaluation rubrics in teams and apply them to actual classes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
